domino_project

Class BoardCardinal

  • java.lang.Object
    • domino_project.Board
      • domino_project.MultiplayerBoard
        • domino_project.BoardCardinal

  • public class BoardCardinal
extends MultiplayerBoard
    This class represents the board of a Cardinal type of Domino Game. This board consists of a DominoLine on where the player and bot put their Tiles and of a SetOfTiles from where they get their hand. It also extends MultiplayerBoard.

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfFits

        public boolean checkIfFits(Tile tile)
        This method checks if the specified Tile(tile) given fits on either side of the line of this board. Fitting condition : sum of touching sides of tiles should equal to 7 or balader.
        Overrides:
        checkIfFits in class Board
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to be checked if fits on DominoLine of this board
        Returns:
        true if tile fits either on beggining or at the end, otherwise false.
